caption.p: Scatterplots of individual Lythrum salicaria plants (a) in year 2 and (b) year 3 of the common garden experiment, showing early‐season plant size (x‐axis, log‐scale), season‐end biomass (y‐axis, log‐scale), and the degree of defoliation by early‐summer generation of the specialist Neogalerucella spp. leaf beetles (see legend for grey scale: darker shades indicate higher defoliation)
